name: Planetary Malignment
description:
Knock your jerk friends out of orbit, dodge comets and asteroids, and claim your spot at the center of the (rapidly shrinking) universe in Planetary Malignment!

Controls

Start: Spacebar

Exit: Esc

Player 1

Move: W A S D

Spin Block: Z

Dash: X

Player 2

Move: T F G H

Spin Block: V

Dash: B

Player 3

Move: I J K L

Spin Block: M

Dash: ,

Player 4

Move: [  ;  '  Return/Enter

Spin Block: /

Dash: Right Shift

Changelog
  • fixed animation bug
  • changed input method
  • updated build metadata
Tools Used
  • Unity 2018.2
  • Visual Studio
  • Blender
  • GIMP
  • Audacity
